data.actual_result: It says that you should let the sub expire before choosing a LOWER TIER plan.
data.expected_result: It should say that you should let the sub expire before choosing a HIGHER TIER plan.
data.short_description: When upgrading from $49.99 classic to $9.99 Nitro, the tooltip on $9.99 uses the term "lower-tier", when you are actually upgrading to a higher-tier nitro.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have the $49.99 classic nitro plan. - Then, go to Settings>Nitro, and hover your mouse over the $9.99 nitro option. Read the tooltip.
